DOCNAME: CASE OF ARKWELL v. THE UNITED KINGDOM
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . His wife died in DATE , leaving CARDINAL children born in DATE and DATE . His claim for widows ' benefits was made on DATE and was rejected on DATE on the ground that he was not entitled to widows ' benefits because he was not a woman . The applicant did not appeal further as he considered or was advised that such a remedy would be bound to fail since no security benefits were payable to widowers under GPE law .
CARDINAL . The domestic law relevant to this application is set out in PERSON v. the GPE , no . CARDINAL , § § DATE , ORG CARDINAL-IV .
